QuestData.Title: A Collection of Coils
QuestData.Description: This coil of rope has been woven thick, the better for the Thunderlord Wranglers to handle the dangerous beasts they tame.$b$bScout Ruk'gan might have a use for this and a few more like it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 5 Coils of Sturdy Rope from Thunderlord Wranglers in the Bones of Agurak.
QuestData.RewardText: Rope? Do you expect me to tie a noose and ask the Thunderlords to go hang themselves?$b$bWait... that gives me an idea. Yea, I think I can make this work with the right materials.$b$bGood Job.
